LanguageData.stl.limit_set.label: Set limit
LanguageData.stl.limit_set.tooltip: Set an upper limit for each tile in this stockpile. The limit is strictly in effect for pawns. Pawns will not haul items exceeding the upper limit.
LanguageData.stl.limit_set.-1.label: No limit
LanguageData.stl.limit_set.-1.tooltip: No limit is default, like vanilla.
LanguageData.stl.limit_set.0.tooltip: Keep empty, like there's no stockpile.
LanguageData.stl.refill_pause.label: Pause refilling
LanguageData.stl.refill_pause.tooltip: Disable refilling for all tiles in this stockpile.
LanguageData.stl.refill_at.label: Refill at
LanguageData.stl.refill_at.tooltip: Set the refill threshold of each tile in this stockpile (lower limit).
LanguageData.stl.refill_at.100.label: Full
LanguageData.stl.refill_at.100.tooltip: Full is default. Always keep fully stocked, like vanilla.
LanguageData.stl.refill_at.50.label: Half
LanguageData.stl.refill_at.0.label: Empty
